hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Lobby Right Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #the Mirror Shield#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path of #gold#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Epona's Song#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that most of the water in Hyrule flows through King Zora's buttocks.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #the Market#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Shortcut Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Flame Circle Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.
